text:
Hello Folks,
Greetings.

I'm dealing with an issue while adding custom fonts in theme JSON. I'm getting the correct custom fonts in the field selection on the theme setting. But it's not loading the actual fonts. I can do this with font-face. But doing so is not the perfect way.


can anyone help me with this?

I'm having the font.json file as well. Where I'm loading the custom fonts.

I have refered this HubSpot document for the same. But didn't work.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/custom-fonts>
